TopicTitle: Kerbal Attachment System is not showing grappling hook and harpoon in KSP 1.7

Articles.Content:
hello members

I have installed KAS mod for KSP 1.7.1 but I don't know why but in utility section in vehicle assembly, features and tools like grappling hook and harpoons are not showing up. I am in dire need of those tools please help me ASAP 

Edited September 8, 2019 by rohit12
